Name: Master Purpose
Details: To justify their position as the rightful rulers of the Niops Association among the waves of refugees that settled in Niops during the fall of the Star League, the scientists of the research outpost created a semi-religion dedicated to the 'Master Purpose' of maintaining the scientific spirit during the chaos of the Succession Wars. The lives and schedules of all associates are controlled as required to achieve this goal, together with daily propaganda and weekly indoctrination curses.
